attributes.action: implement the proposals set out in the www.betterhomes4all.org.uk campaign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which contain links to websites. We suggest you re-word your petition to give it more chance of being accepted. You can read the terms and conditions for Number 10 petitions here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
